channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Fatherhood & the Family of God [The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation]
item.description:
In this episode, Joe, Michael, and Nate continue their discussion on the family by discussing what the archetypal fatherhood of God means for our ectypal familial relationships. Simply put, they discuss what God's fatherhood means for us and our relationships. Oh, how sweet it is to be part of the household of God through Christ our Lord.

For all things Ezra Institute, visit: https://ezrainstitute.com.
For Ezra's many print resources and to join our newsletter, visit: https://ezrapress.com.
item.author: Dr. Joseph Boot, Dr. Michael Thiessen, Nate Wright, SDG Media
item.itunes:author: Dr. Joseph Boot, Dr. Michael Thiessen, Nate Wright, SDG Media
